public class BCKRBF

This class implements Radial Basis Function 3-Layer Network, learning algorithmes should be implemented in subclasses

addHiddenNode 
 public void addHiddenNode(double weights[],
                           int output) throws Exception
Create a new hidden node

Parameters:
weights - is the n-d point which is the centre of the new node
output - is the output neuron id of the output to which this new node will be connected
Throws: Exception
thrown when weights n-d point is of wrong dimensionality
